taskDescription:
Use exponent rules to simplify <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>

    <msup>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>

          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <msup>

                <mn>51</mn>
              </mrow>
              <mn>3</mn>
            </msup>
          </mrow>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mn>6</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left( {{{51}^3}} \right)^6}</annotation></semantics></math>.
